summary: Would u like to take Laurence Polaris, a handsome follower wearing a pair of glasses? Don\'t let the nerdy glasses fool u, he shoots fire, ice and lighting with ease!
descriptionHtml:
This is my 2nd mod and once again, one of my Queer Rangers of the 31st century summoned into the Skyrim world :) and I\'m sure it is easier to use the NMM to download it to skip all the trouble.

U have to get **Apachii skyhair for males** and "Apachii skyhair" by Apachii for Laurence's hair
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168/
Laurence is in a farmer\'s ourfit with glass sword and shield. Well, he was a prince in his previous life and current a professor, so, he can afford those weapons XD
However, I highly recommand u to get the Bosmer Armor :D It's simple gorgeous!
Bosmer Armor Pack by Maty743
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37289
ALso, Laurence wears glasses. Try the following to give him a pair of nice glasses :D
TAKE NEW SLOT Glasses Ears Earring everything in accessories by magicmoon http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11068
DWISS Eyewear - Glasses and Spectacles - final beta by Dwiss
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33853
Since my characters were summoned to the Skyrim world for a crossover, I believe it would be nice to get them jeans and t-shirts for their daily look :)
Blue Jeans Plus Volume 3 by Andrew Clements and Nancy Krantz http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19644//?


Now back to our gay professor (well, sexual orientation is meaningless in Skyrim since all marriage npcs open to both men and women) Laurence has many destruction magic tricks but he use sword and shield well too :) but I worry I gave him too many spells and perks XD So, pls send me feedback, may be I need to power down him. I also uploaded a few pics of him which are done by me.

***************************
Laurence Chi Polaris
Code Name: Polaris
Era: AD31st century
Secret Identity: Laurence
Age: 30
Location: U can find him in Winterhold's Inn :) since most of my Dragonborns are mages studying with Onmund :)
Body:
1.90m/76kg
Zodiac Sign: Sun-Sagittarius, Moon-Libra, Ascendant-Scorpio
Personalities: boy next door, mild, calm, over protecting big brother
Favorite Colors: orange, brown
Likes:
*activities: volleyball and photography
*food: Chinese food in Canton, Shanghai and Beijing style
*clothes: casual wear, old school look
*personalities: honest, optimistic and being happy for what they have and who they are
Sexuality: gay(I guess he\'s queer after u download him as u an make him str8, gay or bi as u like XD)
Powers: destruction magic
Group Affiliation: Rainbow Rescue
author: icyhugs
